author: Anonymous Comp
title: Differences between htdf formatting between edx and lectures
question:
I've noticed that in the edx videos, there are a couple differences as compared to what we learned in class, such as
Using ;; String-> String, while in lecture it's  (@signature String-> String)
The videos also do not include the (@htdf) and (@template) tags.
In order to maintain consistency which format should we follow?
instructor_answer: https://edge.edx.org/courses/course-v1:UBC+CPSC110+2021W2/fccf8fba512e42f7b2ac21a8afe62eea/ The videos are outdated; you should read over this link for the answers you want!
